title.class: pb-2 pt-4 uppercase border-0 border-b-2 border-slate-300 border-solid

button.login: cursor-pointer text-white bg-gradient-to-r from-green-400 via-green-500 to-green-600 hover:bg-gradient-to-br focus:ring-4 focus:outline-none focus:ring-green-300 dark:focus:ring-green-800 shadow-lg shadow-green-500/50 dark:shadow-lg dark:shadow-green-800/80 font-medium rounded-lg text-sm px-4 py-1 text-center
